text: Geupeungui indah keu manusia Galak that cinta keu inong ceudah Galak keu aneuk ngon le areuta Meuganda-ganda meulimpah-limpah Le meuh ngon pirak guda nyang ragoe Leumo ngon keubeu beu le sileupah Lampoh tanaman umong meuligoe Bandum sinaroe udep nyang mewah Bandum nyan seunang udep lam donya Leubeh got teuma sideh bak Allah Sideh bak Tuhan leubeh got teumpat
